QuestData.Title: Blood of the Earthwarder
QuestData.Description: When Deathwing escaped to Deepholm, his corruption was extreme, but perhaps not yet absolute.$B$BThe cultists at Deathwing's Fall harvest and shape the corrupted blood he left behind into living organisms to draw from their power.$B$BWhat if a trace of the Earthwarder's essence remains? After all, Neltharion was the aspect of earth before he was the aspect of death.$B$BGather samples from the living blood the cultists have created and we'll see if any trace of the Earthwarder remains.
QuestData.LogDescription: Gather 5 samples of Blood of Neltharion from Living Blood at Deathwing's Fall.
QuestData.CompletionText: You return, $n. Did you obtain the blood?
QuestData.RewardText: There is still great power present in his blood, $n. I can sense it even now.$B$BYet there is also much corruption. I am not sure we can salvage the Earthwarder's essence from this.
